wikipedia_page.main: Alistair Wilson (born 20 August 1939) is a British sprint canoeist who competed in the mid-1960s. Competing in two Summer Olympics, he earned his best finish of eighth in the K-1 1000 m event at Tokyo in 1964.

response: NTU sports scholars have competed in the summer and winter Olympic Games, the Commonwealth Games and world championships. NTU alumni include England Rugby player Nick Easter and GB Hockey players Crista Cullen and Alistair Wilson.
